wikipedia_page.main: John Lawrence Kelsall (31 July 1947 – 4 November 1986) was a British composer, conductor and lecturer.

response: * John Kelsall, British composer, conductor and lecturer

The poem has been set to music as a Christmas carol by many composers including R O Morris, Harold Darke, Leo Sowerby, John Kelsall and John RutterHyperion Records and is also sung to the traditional Irish melody "Garton".Cyber Hymnal More recently, the poem was given a modern treatment by Christian band Jars of Clay on their 2007 album, Christmas Songs.Jars of Clay - Christmas Songs (Amazon) American composer Jennifer Higdon set the text for solo soprano, harp and four-part chorus.Jennifer Higdon choral works listing |URL=http://jenniferhigdon.com/choralworks.html A new setting by the British composer David J Loxley-Blount was performed in Southwark Cathedral on 8 December 2014 by the Financial Times Choir conducted by Paul Ayres. It was repeated by the Trafalgar Square Christmas Tree on 11 December 2014.David J Loxley-Blount http://www.djloxley-blount.co.uk
